translations: n.协会，团体；兄弟般的关系

phrs.translation: 友爱关系, 帮会, 团体, 友好关系

sentences.sentence: Zhenghai businessmen, backbone of Ningbo Confraternity, have accumulated rich experience of management in their business establishment.
sentences.translation: 作为“宁波帮”中坚的近代镇海籍实业家，在艰苦的创业中积累了丰富的经营管理经验。

sentences.sentence: May is the month of mary. the confraternity of the blessed sacrament ministry will be forming a pilgrimage on saturday, may 5, to the fatima shrine in buffalo.
sentences.translation: 每年五月为圣母月为此本堂圣体会定于本年五月五日星期六组团乘旅游车往美国水牛城花地玛圣堂朝圣。
